title: Alain Goriely
summary: Alain Goriely FRS is a Belgian mathematician, currently holding the statutory professorship (chair) of mathematical modelling[2] at the University of Oxford, Mathematical Institute. He is director of the Oxford Centre for Industrial Mathematics (OCIAM),[3] of the International Brain and Mechanics Lab (IBMTL)[4] and Professorial Fellow at St Catherine's College, Oxford.[5] At the Mathematical Institute, he was the director of external relations and public engagement, from 2013 until 2022, initiating the Oxford Mathematics series of public lectures.[6] In 2022, he was elected to the Royal Society.[7]
